column2:
You can use stolen skills twice. Recharge one random equipped utility skill when you steal.
Goes on cooldown regardless of if a utility skill is recharged.
Order a mummy to take a position and attract enemy attention.
A recipe to make an ascended spear with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Upgrades improve the functionality of your account and characters forever!
Spit a ball of venom that covers an area with a poisonous cloud.
Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 1
Master the raptor mount and learn to share the bonus from Ravenous Strike to all mount engage skills.
These items are only available for a short time.
Defeat the Beastmaster and his thugs.
Learn to enhance the rejuvenating properties of Barrel Roll to also heal downed allies.
You need Noran's Oiled Chest Key to open this chest.
A recipe to make Seraph Draconic Pauldrons.

Have you seen how drafty these buildings are?"
—Cin

This item only has value as part of a collection."
You must be mounted on a griffon before you can attempt this adventure.

Ahai, Commander,

It occurred to me that you'll probably be needing to travel deeper into the desert sooner or later, and my guess is sooner.

While raptors are fine beasts, the highlands are full of steep hills, and a springer may be more useful to you. Head up to the northern hills of the Desert Highlands, and you'll find a stable there run by a girl named Unja. She can help you.

I should warn you—the way to their village is difficult. You'll need to do some training with your raptor first.

Tasa and the other villagers send their greetings.

May your travels be fruitful,
Aksim

Hi there! I hate writing letters, so I'll get straight to the point. You've been a great help at the skimmer ranch, and I think you've earned their trust enough to have a skimmer of your own.

Come find me when you're free, and I'll sell you a skimmer saddle.

—Ardra
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power.
Only available during the Super Adventure Box Festival.
Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Seraph stat combination.
A recipe to make a Seraph Emblazoned Helm.
Double-click to open. Contains a choice of rewards unique to the Samarog encounter.
A recipe to make Seraph Emblazoned Gloves.
A recipe to make Seraph Exalted Boots.
Open to choose a White Mantle Elite Guard Mask.
You hear an ancient voice on the wind.

The magic of the peach has faded while away from its tree in Lake Doric.
A recipe to make ascended medium boots with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Contains a selection of rewards including ascended items and valuable consumables.
A recipe to make ascended heavy shoulders with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Purchase this relic from Distinguished Professor Nazimi in the Domain of Vabbi.
Groups of items offered at a discount.
Cleanse Lyssa's reliquary so the magic may flow freely.
A recipe to make Seraph Emblazoned Boots.
Given by Ebele north of Arid Gladefields upon delivery of letter from Trainer Ardra.

Market research! That's the ticket. I just need to know what those quaggan chaps eat."
—Cin"
